hyp_text: Tɔɣu 1895, tɛlɛ xɛŋa Sino-Japan First War (1894-1895), E Qing gɔvərmɛnti tɛŋa Shimonoseki Treeti, bɛ siŋs tiŋɔ la, E Japan tɔŋa Taiwan la, tɔŋa tiŋɔ la kpa 1945.
